sections.headline: Strategic Partnerships with Global AV Leaders
sections.subheadline: We collaborate with the world's most innovative brands to bring you a curated selection of best-in-class audiovisual technology.

items.name: Canon
items.description: Canon is a global leader in imaging solutions, offering world-class cameras, projectors, and visual communication tools trusted by professionals worldwide.
features: High-performance projectors with superior color accuracy
Advanced camera technology for crystal-clear visuals
Reliable imaging solutions for corporate and educational setups
items.fit: Canon’s expertise in precision imaging perfectly complements Be Av’s mission to deliver sharp, vibrant, and impactful visual solutions for every environment.

items.name: Crestron
items.description: Crestron stands at the forefront of automation and control systems, transforming how people connect and collaborate through smart technology.
features: Seamless AV and lighting control systems
Integrated meeting room and presentation solutions
Scalable automation for residential and commercial use
items.fit: Crestron’s intelligent control systems empower Be Av to create fully integrated environments — enhancing functionality, connectivity, and user experience across all AV projects.

items.name: Insta360
items.description: Insta360 redefines visual storytelling with its innovative 360° and action cameras that capture immersive, high-resolution content from every angle.
features: High-quality output ideal for events, media, and corporate use
items.fit: As the AV industry embraces immersive experiences, Insta360 aligns perfectly with Be Av’s commitment to bringing next-generation imaging solutions to clients who demand creativity and innovation.

items.name: ViewSonic
items.description: ViewSonic is a global provider of visual display technology, offering a comprehensive range of monitors, projectors, and digital signage solutions.
features: High-definition displays with industry-leading color accuracy
Interactive flat panels for education and business
Robust digital signage systems for retail and hospitality
items.fit: ViewSonic’s reliable and innovative display solutions strengthen Be Av’s portfolio in delivering exceptional visual performance for diverse applications.

items.name: Devialet
items.description: Devialet is a French audio technology brand renowned for combining luxury design with revolutionary acoustic engineering.
features: High-fidelity sound systems with elegant aesthetics
items.fit: With Devialet, Be Av enhances its offerings in premium sound integration — providing clients with audio systems that deliver both design excellence and unmatched performance.

sections.headline: Become a Partner
sections.subheadline: Interested in joining our network of leading AV brands? We're always looking for innovative partners to collaborate with.
